Topic.Title: MIssing "EditorDeutsch.aslx." error when creating non-english game with web editor!

Posts.EditableText:
Hi folks! Whenever I create a -German- game and the web editor opens, following error occurs:

```Error: Cannot find a file called 'EditorDeutsch.aslx.```

As prayers didn't help I'm here to find resolution! Help!
Posts.HTML:
Hi folks! Whenever I create a -German- game and the web editor opens, following error occurs:

Error: Cannot find a file called 'EditorDeutsch.aslx.

As prayers didn't help I'm here to find resolution! Help!

Posts.EditableText: Are you using the on-line version? I tested on the desktop before releasing the new  version and that worked okay.
Posts.HTML: Are you using the on-line version? I tested on the desktop before releasing the new version and that worked okay.

Posts.EditableText: @ThePixie yup, the online version. The desktop client works great, yeah. But most of the time I'd like to work with a mac and the online version seems to be the only way to do so right now :/
Posts.HTML: @ThePixie yup, the online version. The desktop client works great, yeah. But most of the time I'd like to work with a mac and the online version seems to be the only way to do so right now :/

Posts.EditableText:
This should be fixed now.

Thanks to Luis for the help.
